content.rendered:
2020 PGA Championship
Package Rates

Hotel2-Round Packages From4-Round Packages From
Parc 55 Hilton San Francisco$1,155/person$2,735/person
Ritz-Carlton, San Francisco $1,655/person$3,485/person
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. A 50% deposit is due at time of booking. The balance is due 90 days prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
